thm frmdval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cfrmd, c0))
  -| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, cword(c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, cres(cconcat, cxp(c3, c3)))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c4)), cfv(cfrmd, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  fvmptd2(hs0, cfrmd, c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c4)), universe, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(cv(hs0)), cword(cv(hs0)))))), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  df-frmd(hs0)
  preq12d(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(cv(hs0)), cword(cv(hs0))))), cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c4), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  opeq2d(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(cv(hs0)), c3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  opeq2d(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(cv(hs0)), cword(cv(hs0)))), c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl6eqr(cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(cv(hs0)), cword(cv(hs0)))), c4, cres(cconcat, cxp(c3, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  reseq2d(cconcat, cxp(cword(cv(hs0)), cword(cv(hs0))), cxp(c3, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sqxpeqd(cword(cv(hs0)), c3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sylan9eqr(cword(cv(hs0)), c3, cword(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  wrdeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqcomd(cword(c0), c3, wcel(c0, c1))
  elex(c0, c1)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c4)), universe))
  prex(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c4)))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}

thm frmdval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c3 >, <(+ ` ndx), c4 > })
  ‚ä£ c2 =(freeMnd ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c3 = Word(c0))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(++ |`(c3 √ó c3))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, { <(Base ` ndx), c3 >, <(+ ` ndx), c4 > }, (freeMnd ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  fvmptd2(hs0, cfrmd, c0, { <(Base ` ndx), c3 >, <(+ ` ndx), c4 > }, universe, { <(Base ` ndx), Word(hs0)>, <(+ ` ndx),(++ |`(Word(hs0)√ó Word(hs0)))> }, universe, c0 ‚àà c1)
  df-frmd(hs0)
  preq12d(<(Base ` ndx), Word(hs0)>, <(+ ` ndx),(++ |`(Word(hs0)√ó Word(hs0)))>, <(Base ` ndx), c3 >, <(+ ` ndx), c4 >, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  opeq2d((Base ` ndx), Word(hs0), c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  opeq2d((+ ` ndx), (++ |`(Word(hs0)√ó Word(hs0))), c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  syl6eqr((++ |`(Word(hs0)√ó Word(hs0))), c4, (++ |`(c3 √ó c3)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  reseq2d(cconcat, (Word(hs0)√ó Word(hs0)), (c3 √ó c3), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  sqxpeqd(Word(hs0), c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0))
  sylan9eqr(Word(hs0), c3, Word(c0), c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c0)
  wrdeq(hs0, c0)
  eqcomd(Word(c0), c3, c0 ‚àà c1)
  elex(c0, c1)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, { <(Base ` ndx), c3 >, <(+ ` ndx), c4 > } ‚àà ùïå)
  prex(<(Base ` ndx), c3 >, <(+ ` ndx), c4 >)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ <(Base ` ndx), c3 >, <(+ ` ndx), c4 > })
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
}

thm frmdbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cword(c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cfrmd, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, cword(c0), cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cbs, c3), cword(c0), cfv(cbs, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(c0), cword(c0)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(cbs, c3, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(c0), cword(c0))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  frmdval(c0, c1, c3, cword(c0), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(c0), cword(c0))))
  eqidd(cword(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqid(cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(c0), cword(c0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cword(c0), cfv(cbs, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(c0), cword(c0))))))), wcel(cword(c0), universe))
  wrdexg(c0, c1)
  grpbase(cword(c0), universe, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(c0), cword(c0))))), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(c0), cword(c0))))
  eqid(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cword(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(cword(c0), cword(c0))))))
}

thm frmdplusg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cfrmd, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(c0, cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1))), wcel(c3, universe))
  eqtr4d(c0, cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cplusg, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1))))), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl5eq(c0, cfv(cplusg, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1))))), cfv(cplusg, c2), wcel(c3, universe))
  fveq2d(cplusg, c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)))), wcel(c3, universe))
  frmdval(c3, universe, c2, c1, cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)))

  eqid(cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)))

  wrdexg(c3, universe)
  mp3an12(wcel(cword(c3), universe), wcel(cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), universe), wf(cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1), cword(c3)), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), universe))
  mpbir2an(wf(cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1), cword(c3)), wfn(cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cv(hs1)), cword(c3)))))
  mp2an(wfn(cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wfn(cconcat, cxp(universe, universe)), wss(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  ccatfn()
  xpss(c1, c1)
  fnssres(cconcat, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c1, c1))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cv(hs1)), cword(c3)))
  eqeltrd(co(cv(hs0), cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cv(hs1)), cword(c3), co(cv(hs0), cconcat, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  ovres(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c1, cconcat)
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cconcat, cv(hs1)), cword(c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cword(c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cword(c3)))
  frmdelbas(cv(hs0), c1, c3, c2)
  frmdelbas(cv(hs1), c1, c3, c2)
  ccatcl(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))
  ffnov(hs0, hs1, cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), c1, c1, cword(c3))
  xpex(c1, c1)
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c2)
  fex2(cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cxp(c1, c1), cword(c3), universe, universe)
  grpplusg(cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), universe, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)))), c1)
  eqid(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)))))
  eqtr4d(c0, cres(cconcat, cxp(c1, c1)), cres(cconcat, emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl6eq(c0, cres(cconcat, emptycls), cfv(cplusg, emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl5eq(c0, cfv(cplusg, emptycls), cfv(cplusg, c2), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cword(c3))

thm vrmdfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c0, cs1(cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvrmd, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c0, cs1(cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  syl5eq(c2, cmpt(s0, c0, cs1(cv(s0))), cfv(cvrmd, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  fvmptd3(hs0, cvrmd, c0, cmpt(s0, c0, cs1(cv(s0))), universe, cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cs1(cv(s0))), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  df-vrmd(hs0, s0)
  mpteq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cs1(cv(s0)))
  elex(c0, c1)
  mptexg(s0, c0, c1, cs1(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, cs1(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: frmdss2
blocks.content: A subset of generators is contained in a submonoid iff the set of words on the generators is in the submonoid. This can be viewed as an elementary way of saying "the monoidal closure of ` J ` is ` Word J ` ". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: frmdup1
blocks.content: Any assignment of the generators to target elements can be extended (uniquely) to a homomorphism from a free monoid to an arbitrary other monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)
